text:
Roku | Los Gatos, CA | Fulltime | www.roku.com | UX Engineer

Roku - www.roku.com - the Switzerland of video streaming is looking for a talented front-end engineer to join our design team and help designers tell better, more impactful stories with the help of technology and prototyping.

Interested? https://www.roku.com/about/jobs/position/ux-engineer
